hari...nelumyaye aththo iwarayi.dan ape ewun.mama dannawa.me blogkarayo athara jiwithe godak dukwinda ewun innawa.ee wagema kisima dukak karadarayak nathuwa lama kalaya gathakarapu ewun wagema rathran handa kate gahagana aapu ewunuth innawa.ee kawuru wunath api okkoma manussayo.methana inna bahutharayak dena thamange demapiyanta menma nidahas adhyapanayata pinsiddha wenna yamak kamak iganagana ee pihiten kiyak hari hambakaraganna aththo.minissu widihata ipadunu api apita labuna awasthawa thawath katahari udakarala denawanam ,ee de nisa ee manussaya sathutin jiwathwenawanam me labagaththu manussa aathmaya athule apita sathutuwenna thawath deyak thiyanawada?me podi ewunuth eewage ape udawu labennama oone pirisak.owun mahaloku dewal apen illanne na.owunta oone adupaduwak nathuwa iganaganna awashya watapitawak witharayi.mathaka thiyaganna.owunge ammala thaththala bahutharayak dinakata rupiyal 625/=ta dadiya wagurawana kamkaruwan waga.ee wagema bahutharayak adhika mathpan panayata abbahiwuwan waga.ehema parisarayaka jiwathwena me podi ewuntath ee wage anagathayak uruma nowannata thiyana ekama galawime margaya adhyapanaya witharamayi.ee nisa puluwan aakarayata me sadkaryata apith sammadanwemu.gedara wadata kellek, waththe wadata minihek, lamaya balaganna ganiyek, kade wadata kollek hoyagana wathukarayata yanawa wenuwata thamangema daruwek balanna yanawa kiyana hangimen ehata yamu.thamange daruwa kiyana hangimen owunge adhyapanayata sahayawemu.ethakota api umbaala maruna dawasata dewiyoth apith ekka hinawewi, hadawathinma.
